## email id

<hr>

```{r email_validation}
email_pattern <- "^[a-zA-Z0-9\\!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9-]+\\.[a-z]"
emails <- c("test9+_A@test.com", "test@test..com", "test-test.com")
grep(x = emails, pattern = email_pattern, value = TRUE)
```
